name: Lone Rider Spider
description:
Lone Rider Spider is a 2D puzzle platformer with black and white pixel art style, in it you take the control of a spider and try to collect flies to feed your colony while avoiding household dangers and keeping fly population low so the human doesn't run out of patience and call the pest control team.

It is developed by a team of four to learn the basics of unity and game design. 

Design, programming & art team:

Deniz T,  Erkan , Onat V, Şeref K
